name: Randall's Island Park
description: Governors Ball Music Festival is a music festival held in Randall's Island, New York City, USA.

name: Empire Polo Club
description: The Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival is an annual music and arts festival held at the Empire Polo Club in Indio, California, located in the Inland Empire's Coachella Valley, in the Colorado Desert.

name: Madison Square Garden
description: Madison Square Garden is a multi-purpose indoor arena in the New York City borough of Manhattan. Located in Midtown Manhattan between 7th and 8th Avenues from 31st to 33rd Streets, it is situated atop Pennsylvania Station.
